title: Evaluation
desc: Virginia Liquidation will interview you regarding the specifics of your project then prepare a schedule and tailored sales solution.

title: Engagement
desc: Virginia Liquidation will forward a letter of agreement outlining the details of sale and the project scope.

title: Identification
desc: We provide staff and materials necessary to prepare a detailed inventory. This can be completed by either our staff or the seller.

title: Web Posting
desc: We prepare event details and inventory for the web. Most events are posted within 1-3 days of the identification process.

title: Online Preview
desc: Once posted, the inventory is fully searchable for preview and immediate bidding. The phase can be tailored to your schedule.

title: Marketing
desc: We utilize direct mail, newsletters, web promotion, social media, and press releases immediately upon posting.

title: Inspection
desc: Most events include a one-day presale inspection or open house, conducted one or two days prior to the event closing.

title: Event Closing
desc: The event closes dynamically (3-10 items per minute). Our system automatically extends time on any last-minute bids.

title: Processing
desc: At the conclusion of the sale, all bidder transactions are automatically processed and receipts are emailed to winning bidders.

title: Removal
desc: Removal is supervised by our staff or the seller. We coordinate disconnects and removals during days, evenings, or weekends.

title: Reconciliation
desc: We prepare a detailed reconciliation with complete bidding history, revenue, costs of sale and proceeds disbursement.

title: Settlement
desc: After delivery of the reconciliation report and sale proceeds, we conduct a closing interview to ensure complete satisfaction.
